div.p: This optional attribute on the element PMODEOFPUBLICATION, belonging to WRITING PRODUCTION . It allows you to identify how a text was published. Its allowable values are self-publication, privatelyPrinted, limitedEdition, subscription, and pirated.

div.codeblock: <PMODEOFPUBLICATION PUBLICATIONMODE="self-published">Elizabeth Cellier printed the pamphlet and sold it from her own house.</PMODEOFPUBLICATION>

<PMODEOFPUBLICATION PUBLICATIONMODE="pirated">Once conveyed into print by Pope's typically cloak-and-dagger methods, these books appeared to readers to legitimate his complaints and prove he had been accurate in calling Mary Wortley Montagu a libeller.</PMODEOFPUBLICATION>
